Coupon performance tracking; **New Customer:** \"WELCOME25\" - 25% off first booking, one per customer, auto-applied to first booking; **Flash Sale:** \"FLASH50\" - 50% off specific services, first 50 redemptions only, expires midnight; **Partner Code:** Bulk generated codes for corporate partner employees - 15% off, unlimited use; **Win-Back:** \"COMEBACK\" sent to inactive customers - 40% off, 30-day expiry; **Membership Perk:** Members auto-get 10% off all bookings, stacks with other discounts up to 30% max;
